Title: Relates to the certification of shampoo assistants
Summary: Relates to the certification of shampoo assistants; requires applicants of such certificate to have completed a minimum of 500 hours of the required 1,000 hours of an approved course of study in cosmetology in a school duly licensed pursuant to the education law and requires such applicants to remain enrolled in such school until completion of such course.
LawCode: Add ยง408-b, amd ยง410, Gen Bus L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the general business law, in relation to certification of shampoo assistants
